pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, July 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, July 19 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement online regarding the Prime Ministerâ€™s Youth Council and will participate in a Twitter Q&A.
